name: Rescue!?
description:
Compete to be the first helicopter to rescue 5 survivors. You'll have to move carefully to keep your winch under control & pick up the survivors successfully.

Requires 2 gamepads, LS to move, hold A to grab a survivor

Chris McHugh - Code

Kasper Arnklit Frandsen - Art

Niall O'Colmain - Design, Code
